湒湒湒

湒字的基本解释

湒
jí
〔湒湒〕下雨声。
温和，和顺。

湒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jí］
［《廣韻》子入切，入緝，精。］
(1)雨下貌；雨声。
(2)沸涌貌。
(3)温和；和顺。

湒字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　湒； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页636第31
【廣韻】子入切【集韻】【韻會】卽入切【正韻】賷入切，?音㗱。【說文】雨下也。一曰沸湧貌。　又丘名。【鄒陽·酒賦】麴湒丘之麥。　又【集韻】七入切，音緝。與潗同。湁潗，水沸貌。　又側立切，音戢。與濈同。和也。

湒字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
湒字的起名意思

温和，和顺。还表示下雨声，如湒湒。

Dazzle
Basic explanation of words
Dazzle
jí
[湒湒] The sound of rain.
Gentle and smooth.
Dazzle
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jí］
["Guangyun" sub-cutting, cutting-edge, fine. ]
(1) The appearance of rain; the sound of rain.
(2) Boiling appearance.
(3) Gentle; Gentle.
Dazzle
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　湒; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 636 31
[Guangyun] Sub-entry [Jiyun] [Rhyme] 卽-entry [Zheng Yun] Nai-entry,? Yin 㗱. [Said Wen] It's raining too. One said the boiling appearance.　Also the name of the hill. 【Zou Yang·Wine Fu】The wheat of Quhuaqiu.　[Jiyun] Seven cuts, sound. Same as 潗. Yan Yun, the appearance of boiling water.　 Cut sideways again, sound slap. Same as 濈. And also.
Dazzle
Source glyph
Character evolution: Xiaozhuan
Italics
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Hong Kong Mingti
Japanese Ming Dynasty
Korean Ming Dynasty
Old glyph
Dazzle
Name meaning
Gentle and smooth. It also means the sound of rain, such as 湒湒.
jí
1) 雨下貌; 雨声。
2) 沸涌貌。
3) 温和; 和顺。
